Home > Hotels & Resorts > 5 Best Resorts In Riviera Maya Mexico To Enjoy Your Stay 5 Best Resorts In Riviera Maya Mexico To Enjoy Your Stay By admin on July 25, 2015 Pin It 
Riviera Maya in Mexico lies along the borders of the Carribean stretching around 86 miles south of the city of Cancun. It comprises the towns called Playa Del Carmen, Tulum and Puerto Morelos. 
Riviera Maya is an ideal sun-drenched spot for people to chill out during their summer vacations. If you are planning a vacation to Riviera Maya then it is important to look out for some of the best resorts in Riviera Maya Mexico. Top Resorts In Riviera Maya Mexico 
Here are the top resorts in Riviera Maya Mexico, where you can enjoy your stay. Grand Velas 
The Grand Velas or the Playa Del Carmen resort is three distinct hotels into one. One of the best features of this resort is the Grand Class which is open only for adults. 
The Grand Class of this resort offers smooth and shiny ocean-facing suites featuring butler service, party showers, spa and tequila service. 
For booking and other details: Grand Velas Zoetry Paraiso de la Bonita 
This is one of the most popular resorts in Riviera Maya Mexico possessing 90 spacious suites. This is a wellness focused resort where you will get a number of exotic services within an affordable range. 
For booking and other information: Zoetry Paraiso de la Bonita Excellence Riviera Cancun 
This resort lies secluded in the area called Puerto Morelos. However, it stands within easy reach from Cancun and Playa. The guests at this resort appreciate the excellence delivered in several amenities including six pools, nine restaurants, eleven bars and 24/7 room service. 
For booking and other information: Excellence Riviera Cancun Cozumel Palace 
Cozumel Palace is a combination of a small all-inclusive resort and a very small island. This is a resort featuring four restaurants, 175 rooms and all the other usual amenities found in all-inclusive resorts. 
For booking and other details: Cozumel Palace Banyan Tree 
This exclusive resort in Mayakoba, Riviera Maya, possess 164 villas which are casually elegant and they feature walk-in showers, walled-in lawns, large outdoor bathtubs, patios featuring hammocks, stylish furniture, private pools and bars. 
Apart from this, you also get to experience numerous outdoor activities like snorkeling, eco tours and golf or even enjoy a day at the spa. 
For booking and other details: Banyan Tree
